<!-- overview:start -->

## Overview

Fetches releases from all public Hoverkraft Tech repositories within a date range

<!-- overview:end -->
<!-- usage:start -->

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: hoverkraft-tech/landing-page/.github/actions/fetch-releases@c83355f5e435231ea4abbc2364aedeba97e58741 # 2.2.1
  with:
    # Fetch releases since this date (ISO 8601 format)
    # This input is required.
    since-date: ""

    # Fetch releases until this date (ISO 8601 format)
    # This input is required.
    until-date: ""

    # GitHub token for API access
    # This input is required.
    github-token: ""
```

<!-- usage:end -->
<!-- inputs:start -->

## Inputs

| **Input**          | **Description**                                  | **Required** | **Default** |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------ | ----------- |
| **`since-date`**   | Fetch releases since this date (ISO 8601 format) | **true**     | -           |
| **`until-date`**   | Fetch releases until this date (ISO 8601 format) | **true**     | -           |
| **`github-token`** | GitHub token for API access                      | **true**     | -           |

<!-- inputs:end -->
<!-- secrets:start -->
<!-- secrets:end -->
<!-- outputs:start -->

## Outputs

| **Output**          | **Description**                                                                       |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **`releases-data`** | JSON-stringified array of releases data. If no releases are found, this will be null. |
